record.title: RELATIVE TO THE DEATH OF THOMAS F. EAGLETON

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of S. Res. 97 submitted earlier today.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon table, and any statements be printed at the appropriate place in the Record as if given, with no intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
